Prior Treatment Patient must treat rituximab either alone combination chemotherapy . Patient must time progression ≥ 6 month last rituximab dose . No corticosteroid within two week prior study , except maintenance therapy nonmalignant disease . Maintenance therapy dose may exceed 20 mg/day prednisone equivalent . No prior radioimmunotherapy within 12 month study entry . Age ≥ 18 year . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status 02 . Measurable disease must present either physical examination image study . Nonmeasurable disease alone acceptable .
